Bookbalanceforthepreviousperiod: Ledger balance of the previous period
Totaldebitduringtheperiod: Total debit transactions during the period
Totalcreditduringtheperiod: Total credit transactions during the period
Bookbalancefortheendofperiod: Ledger balance at the end of the period
Actualbalanceattheendoftheperiod: Actual balance at the end of the period
differencebetweentheactualandbookbalance: The difference between the actual and Ledger balance
errmsg: you must select record to save
